title: following provisions of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 19 of 2024)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2024. 

In this Order, “Principal Act” means the Child Care Act 1991 (No. 17 of
text_norm: 1 order may cited child care (amendment) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024 order principal act mean child care act 1991 (no 17

title: following provisions of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 19 of 2024)
following provisions of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 19 of 2024)
heading: 3. The 30th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 30th day of September 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Child Care (Amendment) Act 2024 (No. 19 of 2024) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 1; 

(b) 

section 2; 

(c) 

section 3; 

(d) paragraph (a) of section 4; 

(e) 

paragraph (b) of section 4, insofar as that paragraph relates to the 
insertion of the following definitions in section 58A of the 
Principal Act: 

(i) 

“childminding service”; 

(ii) 

“premises”; 

(iii) “registered provider”; 

(f) 

(g) 

subparagraphs (i) and (ii) of section 5(a); 

subparagraph (iii) of section 5(a), insofar as that subparagraph 
relates to the insertion of paragraphs (g) and (h) in section 58B(2) 
of the Principal Act; 

(h) 

section 6; 

(i) 

(j) 

section 7, other than paragraph (d); 

section 10; 

(k) paragraph (a) of section 16; 

(l) 

sections 17 to 23. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [495] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 September, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [495]
